title: Courrier UK: Moving & Delivery
description:
Need to move furniture from one place to another?
Or maybe you need appliances or larger parcel delivery in London?

Download Courrier UK and get the job set up in minutes. Our network of trusted, professional movers, couriers, and vans of all sizes are here to help whenever you need them. 

Say goodbye to traditional moving hassles - our moving and local parcel delivery app links you with independent drivers who handle moving, home deliveries, transport, hauling, and junk removal in London, UK.

■ GET VANS, COURIERS, AND MOVERS ON DEMAND IN LONDON
Forget about renting expensive trucks or tedious inquiries from unreliable gophers. Courrier UK’s courier delivery app is London's answer to swift apartment moves, IKEA deliveries, furniture transfers, parcel delivery, urgent delivery, and more. Find vans of different sizes and vetted moving helpers for reliable transport of your belongings. 

■ WHAT CAN COURRIER UK HELP YOU WITH:
Use Courrier to find delivery and moving help with the following moving services & more:
‣ Small Apartment Moves. For the DIY mover that needs help moving large items like beds, dressers, tables, couches, and more.
‣ Retail Store Delivery for furniture, appliances, home and garden items, and more.
‣ Products and furniture pieces that you order second-hand from online marketplaces.
‣ Small Business or office move? Find help to get settled in quickly.
‣ Junk Removal. Book a Courrier to remove and haul away your junk. Includes trash removal and responsible disposal.
‣ Donation Drop-off. 

Our gophers and couriers can also help with:
→ Storage moves: effortlessly move belongings to long-term storage.
→ Furniture relocation and removal: from one corner of London to another.
→ Appliance moves: Seamlessly relocate household essentials.
→ Anything that two people could reasonably move

■ BOOK MOVING AND COURIER DELIVERY SERVICES EASILY
1. Share the Details: Tell us the pickup and drop-off location (everything is shown on a map), description of the load, and images.
2. Pick a van (small, medium, large van) and if additional labor is required (for example if the load is too heavy to be picked up by one courier).
3. Get a Price: Receive an instant, guaranteed quote. Then pay to book the courier and moving service.
4. Real-Time Tracking: Stay connected with your Courrier's journey and see your trip schedule and history.

■ COURRIER UK APP FEATURES:
● Easy: Skip the stress and time-consuming logistics. Book couriers, vans and gophers in mere minutes all from the courier and movers app. 
● Hassle-Free: Almost every move that can suit large vans is welcomed, just give us a description.
● Budget-Friendly: Transparent pricing upfront on the courier delivery app - no surprises.
● Convenient: On-demand, tailored to your schedule. Whenever you need assistance, just book our courier and moving help.
● Reliable: Our courier delivery drivers are screened, reviewed, and covered by commercial insurance. You can see driver and van information and reviews of the driver. All your current and past bookings are also available in the app.
● Suitable for couriers as well: sign up a service provider and list your courier services and vans available for delivery and renting.

Meet your personal moving squad, ready to handle loading, hauling, and delivering anything in London. In a city like London, where efficiency and convenience are paramount, the Courrier UK app can be your game-changer.

► Download Courrier UK: Movers & Delivery NOW
_________________

Courrier UK is Live in London, UK. More locations coming soon!
We'd love to hear from you.
